(ROOT
  (NP (NNP Hisato) (NNP ,)))


nn(,-2, Hisato-1)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP$ my) (JJ Japanese) (NN food) (NNS sensei))
    (VP (VBZ tells)
      (NP (PRP me))
      (SBAR (IN that)
        (S
          (NP (DT the) (JJ true) (JJ Japanese) (NN foodie))
          (VP (MD will)
            (VP (VB have)
              (NP (CD two) (JJ favorite) (NNS restaurants)))))))
    (. .)))

dobj(tells-5, me-6)
mark(have-13, that-7)

amod(foodie-11, true-9)
amod(foodie-11, Japanese-10)

aux(have-13, will-12)
ccomp(tells-5, have-13)
num(restaurants-16, two-14)
amod(restaurants-16, favorite-15)
dobj(have-13, restaurants-16)

    (, ,)))

  (S
    (S
      (NP (PDT All) (DT the) (NNS noodles))
      (VP (MD should)
        (VP (VB pop)
          (PP (IN into)
            (NP
              (NP (PRP$ your) (NN mouth))
              (PP (IN in)
                (NP
                  (QP (JJR less) (IN than) (DT a))

      (NP (PRP$ your) (NN slurp))

  (S
    (NP (PRP$ Its) (NN ok))
    (VP (RB not)

        (VP (TO to)
          (VP (VB finish)

    (. .)))

nsubj(not-3, ok-2)
root(ROOT-0, not-3)
aux(finish-5, to-4)
xcomp(not-3, finish-5)
predet(water-8, all-6)
det(water-8, the-7)
dobj(finish-5, water-8)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP It))
    (VP (VBD was)
      (NP (DT a)
        (ADJP (RB very) (JJ interesting))
        (NN lesson)))
    (, ,)))


nsubj(lesson-6, It-1)
cop(lesson-6, was-2)
det(lesson-6, a-3)
advmod(interesting-5, very-4)
amod(lesson-6, interesting-5)
root(ROOT-0, lesson-6)


(ROOT
  (FRAG
    (PP (CC but)
      (NP (NNP personally)))
    (, ,)))


root(ROOT-0, but-1)
dep(but-1, personally-2)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP I))
    (ADVP (RB still))
    (VP (VBP prefer)
      (NP
        (NP (DT a) (NN plate))
        (PP (IN of)
          (NP
            (NP (JJ hot) (NN wanton) (NN mee))
            (NP (DT any) (NN day))))))
    (. !)))


nsubj(prefer-3, I-1)
advmod(prefer-3, still-2)
root(ROOT-0, prefer-3)
det(plate-5, a-4)
dobj(prefer-3, plate-5)
prep(plate-5, of-6)
amod(mee-9, hot-7)
nn(mee-9, wanton-8)
pobj(of-6, mee-9)
det(day-11, any-10)
dep(mee-9, day-11)


(ROOT
  (SINV
    (VP (VBZ Is)
      (ADVP (RB there)))
    (NP
      (NP (DT some) (NN sort))
      (PP (IN of)
        (NP
          (NP (NN ritual))
          (PP (TO to)
            (S
              (VP (VBG eating)
                (NP (NNP Wanton) (NNP Mee)))))
          (, ,))))))


root(ROOT-0, Is-1)
advmod(Is-1, there-2)
det(sort-4, some-3)
nsubj(Is-1, sort-4)
prep(sort-4, of-5)
pobj(of-5, ritual-6)
prep(ritual-6, to-7)
pcomp(to-7, eating-8)
nn(Mee-10, Wanton-9)
dobj(eating-8, Mee-10)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP (VBP wonder))
    (. ?)))

root(ROOT-0, wonder-2)


(ROOT
  (S (IN So)
    (ADVP (RB there))
    (NP (PRP you))
    (VP (VBP go))
    (. !)))


dep(go-4, So-1)
advmod(go-4, there-2)
nsubj(go-4, you-3)
root(ROOT-0, go-4)


(ROOT
  (S
    (ADVP (RB Hope))
    (NP (PRP it))
    (VP (VBZ increases)
      (NP
        (NP (PRP$ your) (NN appreciation))
        (PP (IN of)
          (NP (NNP Soba) (NNS noodles))))
      (NP (JJ next) (NN time)))
    (. !)))


advmod(increases-3, Hope-1)
nsubj(increases-3, it-2)
root(ROOT-0, increases-3)
poss(appreciation-5, your-4)
iobj(increases-3, appreciation-5)
prep(appreciation-5, of-6)
nn(noodles-8, Soba-7)
pobj(of-6, noodles-8)
amod(time-10, next-9)
dobj(increases-3, time-10)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (NNP Teuchi) (NNP Soba) (NNP Matsunaga))
    (VP (VBZ 2-19-12))
    (, ,)))


nn(Matsunaga-3, Teuchi-1)
nn(Matsunaga-3, Soba-2)
nsubj(2-19-12-4, Matsunaga-3)
root(ROOT-0, 2-19-12-4)

  (NP (NNP Jingumae) (NNP ,)))


nn(,-2, Jingumae-1)

  (FRAG
    (PP (IN Shibuya-ku))
    (, ,)))


root(ROOT-0, Shibuya-ku-1)


(ROOT
  (NP (NNP Tokyo) (NNP 03-3402-7738) (NNP View) (NNP Larger) (NNP Map)))


nn(Map-5, Tokyo-1)
